entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Evoland 2
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫59,99 [‚Ç∫59,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫59,99

Application Description

What were your childhood games like? Onboard on an epic adventure of more than 20 hours through video games history filled with a ton of funny classical games references. From 2D RPG, through 3D vs fight to a shooter, a trading card game and more you‚Äôll get your fill of jumping from a game genre to another, never bored. ‚ÄúEvoland 2: A slight case of spacetime continuum disorder‚Äù is not only one game but many, backboned with a story that will make you travel through time, discovering different art styles and video gaming technology. Released first on PC with 500.000 copies shipped, we‚Äôre proud to share with you this experience carefully adapted for mobile devices. ¬´ It‚Äôs a mashup on a grand scale ‚Äî and a successful one ‚Äî bringing together many of the elements that make us love all those games individually. ¬ª - 9/10 GamesBeat ‚ÄúEvoland 2 manages to seamlessly blend an incredible number of genres into a single, wonderful experience.‚Äù 4/5 ‚Äì Hardcoregamer Compatible with MFI controllers. If you experience any problem with Evoland 2, please contact our customer support at hello@playdigious.com and give us as much as possible information on your problem.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Evoland
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫29,99 [‚Ç∫29,99 ~ ‚Ç∫129,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫29,99

Application Description

Evoland is an action adventure game that takes you on a journey through the history of classic adventure and RPG gaming. As you progress through the game, you unlock new technologies, gameplay systems and ever-improving graphics. From monochrome to full 3D graphics and from turn-based battles to real-time boss fights, Evoland makes you live the evolution of adventure gaming ‚Äì all with plenty of humour and nods to moments from classic games. - Play through the history of action-adventure video games - Discover many evolutions, from old school 2D action/adventure to active time battles and full 3D action - Revisit the starting area rendered in full 3D or explore the overworld with your own airship! - And have fun with the dungeons, puzzles, a heap of secrets to uncover, and hundreds of achievements and stars to collect Check out the official website at evoland.shirogames.com Follow us on Twitter @playdigious Like us on Facebook /playdigious If you experience any problem with Evoland, please contact our customer support team at playdigious@gmail.com. Don't forget to specify which device and operating system you are using. Supported languages: English, German, Spanish, French, Chinese, Korean, Japanese

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Motorsport Manager 4
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • BundleÔºö‚Ç∫449,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99 [‚Ç∫229,99 ~ ‚Ç∫449,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

In-App Purchases

  • BundleÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Pre registration bundleÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • Premium livery bundleÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • Game EditorÔºö‚Ç∫249,99
  • Very Large InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Large InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Huge InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • InvestmentÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Chairman's PaymentÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

Application Description

MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success. ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination. REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars. UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry. DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey. YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you. SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Deflection
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫179,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [Free ~ ‚Ç∫599,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Deflection is a powerful, versatile calculator for beams, 2D trusses, and 2D frames. The interface is simple and intuitive, and the graphical output is state-of-the-art. In addition to reaction, shear, bending moment, and deflection results, Deflection also computes internal shear and bending stress along the cross section and along the beam. 2D FRAME AND TRUSS EDITOR The 2D editor is seamlessly integrated with the beam editor. Draw arbitrary frame and truss structures and apply loads and constraints using the same simple interface as for beams. You can visualize results directly within the 2D editor, or you can select a beam and get additional insights. INTERNAL STRESSES Obtain internal bending and shear stress diagrams in addition to shear, bending, and deflection diagrams. The internal stresses can be visualized along the length of the beam as well as along the vertical axis of the cross section using the beam editor. CROSS SECTION EDITOR Edit built-in cross sections. Moment of inertia and area values are automatically calculated and applied to the rest of the beam calculations. MORE FEATURES ‚Ä¢ The built-in database contains more data for your reference and convenience. ‚Ä¢ Apply beam self-weight optionally ‚Ä¢ Unlimited design files ‚Ä¢ Quick-start templates CONTACT We like to hear from you! Please email contact@ketchep.com if you have any issues, questions, or comments.

entry.title: Be Focused Pro- Pomodoro Timer
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫599,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫349,99 [‚Ç∫229,99 ~ ‚Ç∫599,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫349,99

Application Description

Staying on task seems is a real challenge for our screen-bound generation. The Be Focused lets you get things done by breaking up individual tasks among discrete intervals, separated by short breaks. It‚Äôs a surprisingly effective way to retain motivation and focus. Create tasks, configure breaks and track your progress throughout the day, week or custom period. Use Be Focused on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac ‚Äî everything stays perfectly in sync. Task Management ‚Ä¢ Create and manage tasks ‚Ä¢ Add notes and due dates to tasks ‚Ä¢ Organize tasks with tags and filters ‚Ä¢ Paste task lists from other apps Timer Control ‚Ä¢ Start, pause, or skip intervals ‚Ä¢ Auto-start the next interval (optionally) ‚Ä¢ Plan intervals needed for task completion and track accuracy ‚Ä¢ Manage completed intervals Timer Customization ‚Ä¢ Set durations for work sessions, short and long breaks ‚Ä¢ Define number of intervals before a long break ‚Ä¢ Set a daily goal for completed intervals ‚Ä¢ Assign different timer settings to individual tasks Reports ‚Ä¢ View detailed reports to monitor your progress ‚Ä¢ Export your data in CSV format Sounds and Notifications ‚Ä¢ Chronometer ticking sound with adjustable frequency ‚Ä¢ Variety of alarm sounds ‚Ä¢ Interactive notifications ‚Ä¢ Adjustable volume for alarms and chronometer Integration ‚Ä¢ Sync across all your devices (iPhone, iPad, Mac) * ‚Ä¢ Integration with Focus Matrix to manage tasks using urgent/important principle ** ‚Ä¢ Integration with Shortcuts app to automate workflow Quick Access ‚Ä¢ Widgets for Lock Screen and Home Screen ‚Ä¢ Live activities for Lock Screen and Dynamic Island ‚Ä¢ Control to start or stop the timer from the Lock Screen, Controls Center, or Action Button Automation ‚Ä¢ Integration with Shortcuts app (control tasks and timers via Shortcuts app) ‚Ä¢ Automate Shortcuts execution on events in Be Focused app Device Support ‚Ä¢ Apple Watch support ‚Ä¢ Also available for Mac ‚Ä¢ Dark and Light mode support * Sync with Mac requires Be Focused Pro for macOS, sold separately. ** Integration with Focus Matrix requires the Pro version of Focus Matrix, sold separately.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Knight & Dragon III
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫179,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫99,99 ~ ‚Ç∫179,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

Rare Items! Class Change! And an epic story. The third installment of the full-fledged hack-and-slash RPG "Knight and Dragon," packed with replayability! "Knight and Dragon 3" is the third installment in the hack-and-slash RPG series set in a medieval fantasy world. One morning, after receiving a certificate from an elderly gentleman, proving you as a full-fledged guild member, you are sent to a small village in the Republic of Gringard. This is where the story begins. Various incidents occurring in the Republic, the conflicts with the neighboring Lindahl Empire, and the story of knights and dragons will eventually involve you in a grand destiny revolving around the stars. [Features of Knight and Dragon 3] ‚ñΩ The basic systems of a replayable RPG such as intense real-time battles, rare item drops, and class changes are inherited from the previous game! ‚ñΩ Real-time battles are now more interactive, allowing you to dodge, parry, and counter by reading the enemy‚Äôs attack timings! ‚ñΩ A variety of weapons like axes, spears, and halberds appear among the items! Additionally, you can create characters to your liking, including dual-wielding and two-handed weapons! ‚ñΩ A world map that enhances the epic story is introduced! The story, with even more volume than the previous game, and the end content are still going strong! ‚ñΩ Moreover, in this game, a diverse range of NPCs with unique characteristics, place names, city names, and other proper nouns depict the grand story! ‚ñΩ Other features such as party dispatch and the Persona function, which were well received in the previous game, are of course continued! „Éª„Éª„Éª For those who want to get a feel for the game before purchasing, the previous game "Knight and Dragon" is completely free to enjoy, so please give it a try. Official Homepage http://dgjam.com/knightdragon3

Application Screenshot

iPhone
